meanings.sent1: The cat volted over the fence effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She volted across the stream to reach the other side.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo volted over the moon in a silly dream.
meanings.sent4: His heart volted with joy when he saw her smile.
meanings.sent5: The athlete volted over the hurdles with grace and speed.

meanings.definition: Provided with a certain amount of electrical potential.
meanings.sent1: The battery was fully volted and ready to power the device.
meanings.sent2: He checked the volted wires to ensure a safe connection.
meanings.sent3: The robot felt volted up and ready to conquer the world.
meanings.sent4: The room was volted with energy as the concert began.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds looked volted with lightning, ready to strike at any moment.
